prTitle: feat: implement CSS reset and global styles
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented comprehensive CSS reset and global styles in `src/styles/global.css` as part of the Global Styles and Design System feature.

### Changes Made

- **Created `src/styles/global.css`** with modern CSS reset approach
- **Box-sizing reset** - Applied `border-box` to all elements and pseudo-elements
- **Margin/padding normalization** - Removed default margins and padding from all elements
- **Global base styles** for html, body, and common elements including:
  - Modern system font stack with fallbacks
  - Improved font rendering with antialiasing
  - Proper line-height and text rendering optimizations
- **Accessibility improvements** including:
  - High contrast focus styles with `focus-visible` support
  - Screen reader utilities (`.sr-only`, skip links)
  - Respect for user preferences (`prefers-reduced-motion`)
- **Smooth scrolling** enabled (with user preference respect)
- **Font smoothing** with `-webkit-font-smoothing` and `-moz-osx-font-smoothing`
- **CSS Variables** defined for consistent design tokens (31 variables total)
- **Typography base styles** for headings and text elements
- **Form element normalization** for consistent appearance
- **Print styles** for better print output

### Technical Features

- Modern CSS reset approach (not normalize.css)
- Minimal but comprehensive reset that won't interfere with component styles
- CSS custom properties for theme variables with sensible fallbacks
- Accessibility-first focus management
- Mobile-responsive typography base
- Performance optimized font rendering
- Comprehensive design token system integrated

### File Structure

```
src/
└── styles/
    └── global.css (383 lines of comprehensive styles)
```

### Validation

- ✅ All acceptance criteria met
- ✅ CSS syntax validated
- ✅ Accessibility features implemented
- ✅ Design tokens integrated
- ✅ Modern reset approach applied
- ✅ Cross-browser compatibility considered

Closes #83
